Name: San Matias - Mafia City
About the game: San Matias Mafia City is remake of the one popular game , this version has enhanced graphics, offline play, and tons of fun. We are working on improvements based on all the community feedback we have been receiving. Time is running out! You play as a man named 'The Canario'. Fight hordes of enemies and try to survive in this city without laws. It's time to teach them a lesson! FEATURES * 30 missions * Controllable vehicles, like tanks, cars, helicopters and turrets! * Multiple weapons * Change your aspect (mask!) * Explosives * Achievements * Bull Time * A shop with awesome ingame features like GodMode, Golden Gun and a Jetpack!! * Lots and lots of explosions!
